thread.title: Watch DeMarcus Cousins knock down his first shot with the Pelicans
thread.title_full: Watch DeMarcus Cousins knock down his first shot with the Pelicans

title: Watch DeMarcus Cousins knock down his first shot with the Pelicans
text:
Feb 23, 2017 at 8:40p ET 0Shares 
The DeMarcus Cousins era in New Orleans has begun and the Pelicans’ newest star got it going early Thursday against the Rockets. 
Cousins scored the first points of the game after setting a high screen for Jrue Holiday, who swung it back to Cousins for an open 20-footer. Great start to his Pelican career! Let's BOOGIE! pic.twitter.com/HV4gldY0bp 
— New Orleans Pelicans (@PelicansNBA) February 24, 2017 
Cousins knocked down another jumper later in the quarter, this time off the dribble. 
— New Orleans Pelicans (@PelicansNBA) February 24, 2017 
Cousins hit three of his first four shots and finished the first quarter with eight points and two rebounds. Anthony Davis had eight points and one rebound as the Rockets took a 30-28 lead after one quarter.
